document_data.name: Radatha
document_data.sex: Male<ref group="note">In the first mention of Radatha, he was misgendered. Through the rest of the adventure he's referred by the male pronoun. The image depicting him is also male.
document_data.mainbody: '''Radatha''' was the leader of the [[Fire Knives]] cell in [[Tilverton]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History: Radatha led a group of Fire Knives that escaped to Tilverton. After the cell refuged in [[Westgate]] was destroyed by [[Alias]]'s party, in 1357 Radatha agreed to join a [[New Alliance]] with [[Tyranthraxus]], the [[Zhentarim]], priests of [[Moander]] and one [[Red Wizards of Thay]] in order to imbue in an adventurer the [[Azure Bonds]]. Radatha's goal was kill the King [[Azoun Obarskyr IV]]. Meantime his minions managed to capture the runaway princess [[Alusair Obarskyr]] in order to lure Azoun IV in Tilverton. At last however Radatha's plan backfired and he was killed by Alusair.
